Summary: While looking out my bedroom window, a bright large light sped across the NE sky below tree level
divs: sighting detailsthis is an attachment to a recent sighting i reported on 5\19\07. i was lying in bed where the ne sky is viewed from my large window. i saw a bright light come from the left margin of my window and speed accross to the n at below tree level, because i could see the trees\branches in front of the light. the size is difficult to explain, but it seemed that from where i was lying, my view was like the size of a lightbult, (a star would be a small spot in comparison ?). it passed by once and that i saw. incidentally, the bright star-like lights i have been witnessing cirlcing nightly (in the ne sky) were flashing noticably more prominently.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Grand Rapids
There were no other sightings in Grand Rapids on or around May 20th 2007
